name: Ordit
slogan: Ordit is a on-demand B2B marketplace for corporates to streamline catering, delivery and takeaways
description: Ordit is a on-demand B2B marketplace for corporates to streamline catering, delivery and takeaways.

team.title: Contracting BI analyst
team.name: David Badovinac
team.bioHtml: Efficient, reliable and hardworking individual with the ambition needed to strive for success, battling and overcoming challenges along the way.

jobs.title: Startup Generalist
jobs.description:
**About the role**
This is a foundational role that will provide you with the opportunity to work across an early-stage startup and gain exposure across the company and team, and take responsibilities for key day-to-day business operations at Ordit.

**Role Description**
We’re currently looking for a Startup Generalist to join our team in London! In our team there is no typical day, and to be successful in this role you will need to be self-motivated, creative and have excellent interpersonal and relationship-building skills to be able to support our customers, restaurants and catering partners.
On a given week you might be, liasing with the sales team supporting them throughout the sales cycle, managing the various internal tools, liasing with customers and partners. Building process documentation and supporting our back office.

**About you**
You can coordinate, prioritise and manage multiple diverse projects simultaneously
You are comfortable working in a fast-moving and sometimes ambiguous environment
You enjoy a lot of variety in your daily and weekly objectives
You have strong organisational, writing and numerical skills
You are a confident and persuasive communicator
You enjoy working autonomously and being responsible for key business objectives.
Proficient with Microsoft Excel and Google Sheets.
Attention to detail with impeccable standards.
If you have what it takes, we look forward to hearing from you! (edited) 

**Compesation**
Competitive compensation package
Travel allowance
Flexible working hours
Opportunity to help scale a really cool startup across Europe
